description: Device with two thermostats and remote reboot.

contents.name: workingSet
contents.description: Current working set of the device memory in KiB.

contents.name: reboot
contents.description: Reboots the device after waiting the number of seconds specified.

request.name: delay
request.description: Number of seconds to wait before rebooting the device.

contents.name: deviceInformation
contents.description: Optional interface with basic device hardware information.

description: Reports current temperature and provides desired temperature control.

contents.name: targetTemperature
contents.description: Allows to remotely specify the desired target temperature.

contents.name: maxTempSinceLastReboot
contents.description: Returns the max temperature since last device reboot.

contents.name: getMaxMinReport
contents.description: This command returns the max, min and average temperature from the specified time to the current time.

request.name: since
request.description: Period to return the max-min report.

contents.name: manufacturer
contents.description: Company name of the device manufacturer. This could be the same as the name of the original equipment manufacturer (OEM). Ex. Contoso.

contents.name: model
contents.description: Device model name or ID. Ex. Surface Book 2.

contents.name: swVersion
contents.description: Version of the software on your device. This could be the version of your firmware. Ex. 1.3.45

contents.name: osName
contents.description: Name of the operating system on the device. Ex. Windows 10 IoT Core.

contents.name: processorArchitecture
contents.description: Architecture of the processor on the device. Ex. x64 or ARM.

contents.name: processorManufacturer
contents.description: Name of the manufacturer of the processor on the device. Ex. Intel.

contents.name: totalStorage
contents.description: Total available storage on the device in kilobytes. Ex. 2048000 kilobytes.

contents.name: totalMemory
contents.description: Total available memory on the device in kilobytes. Ex. 256000 kilobytes.
